A big active volcano, the local sceenery, land, water, ect.

The drones scans showed tectonic activity from the volcano that housed the
Black fortress, ash and soot lay across the hot charred ground. Lunarpine
and Silver Scouts signatures registered strongest along with the signal of
Shivah while Foxfingers and Razor Claws were masked by the energy field
protecting the Predacon base. Geographical surveys showed a few cracks and
caves leading into the burning center of the volcano where the negotiations
were taking place.
----- Original Message -----
From: <hugar_twriker@...>
To: <nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, November 12, 2001 3:13 PM
Subject: What does he see?


�Grizzltron�


   Grizzltron steps out of the drone and looks around.  What does he
see?

OOC:  What does he see?

PSOOC:  What does he see?

from either
